message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a significant discount. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice
